Title: Requires health insurers to offer coverage of health care provided by out-of-network providers
Summary: Requires health insurers to offer coverage of health care provided by out-of-network providers.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-e & 4306-d, Ins L; amd §4403, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring health care insurers to offer coverage for health care provided by out-of-network providers
